search.query: | tstats count where index=* earliest=-60m@m latest=now by index | sort - count
index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd component=Metrics group=per_index_thruput earliest=-60m@m | timechart sum(kb) by series
| metadata type=hosts index=* | eval lastSeen=strftime(lastTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | table host lastSeen
| tstats count where index=* earliest=-60m@m latest=now by sourcetype | sort - count
